opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of January, 2011, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED. Additionally, we hereby deny Appellee Department of General Services’ ancillary Application for Leave to File Post-Submission Communication.
Chief Justice CASTILLE and Justice SAYLOR dissent in favor of oral argument and resolution by opinion.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
